Package com.virtualbankv2.control

package com.virtualbankv2.control
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AccountManager
    Manages account-related operations.
    AccountOverviewPage
    The AccountOverviewPage class is part of the control package of the VirtualBankV2 application.
    ChildLockManager
    The ChildLockManager class is part of the control package of the VirtualBankV2 application.
    CreateTaskController
    The CreateTaskController class is responsible for managing the interactions between the CreateTaskPage view and the underlying task creation logic.
    GoalManager
    The GoalManager class provides functionality to manage user goals in the Virtual Bank application.
    GoalManagerTest
     
    HomePageController
    The HomePageController class is responsible for handling user interactions on the home page of the Virtual Bank application.
    HomePageControllerTest
     
    InterestController
    This class handles the interest calculation and updating process.
    InterestControllerTest
     
    LoginController
    The LoginController class provides the logic to check user credentials during the login process for the Virtual Bank application.
    LoginControllerTest
     
    SignUpController
    The SignUpController class handles the logic for the user sign-up process in the Virtual Bank application.
    SignUpControllerTest
     
    TransactionManager
    This class handles the logic for transferring money between accounts and recording the transactions.
    TransactionManagerTest
     
    VirtualBankApplication
    VirtualBankApplication class is the main class that initializes and runs the virtual bank application.
    VirtualBankApplicationTest
